name: item-drop
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Selects another friendly Pokémon at random. If that Pokémon is holding an item, that item is removed for the duration of the battle. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Forces a friendly Pokémon to drop its held item.

flavor_text.black_white: When used, it causes an ally Pokémon to drop a held item.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: When used, it causes an ally Pokémon to drop a held item.
